授業方法: The class will be conducted online via Zoom (simultaneous and two way). Please see "Note" how to join the first online class. By discussing real world cases of business success and failure in Japan and practicing cross cultural communication techniques, students will develop a portfolio of best practices in business communication and management. At the beginning of each class students will present a summary of the assigned case study or reading followed by class discussions that will be supplemented by materials from the instructor.
